snippet: The American Lindsey Vonn won a World Cup super-G on Saturday in St. Moritz, Switzerland, to stay unbeaten in four speed races this season.
abstract: Lindsey Vonn wins World Cup super-G in St. Moritz, Switzerland, to stay unbeaten in four speed races this season; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The American Lindsey Vonn won a World Cup super-G on Saturday in St. Moritz, Switzerland, to stay unbeaten in four speed races this season.

headline.seo: Lindsey Vonn Wins Super-G, but Celebration Sparks Debate
headline.main: Vonn Wins the Super-G, Then Sparks a Debate
